MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CW8 postcode area of Acton Bridge, affecting properties in Cliff Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:20PM . Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:40PM on 28th December 2020
